title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders and different colored backgrounds, making them stand out and look bad.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should be created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. This will prevent the automatic borders and colored backgrounds, making the page look better.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the text fields and their appearance on motif platforms.
